name: Card RPG Orphan
description:
Card RPG is a story driven turn based card game. Collect cards, craft equipment, increase your attributes, complete quests and earn money in your quest to save the orphanage.

An orphan saved and raised by Clover Field Orphanage reaches maturity and yearns to follow their late parents into the adventurer profession.
However just as the orphan makes their first steps in the adventurer profession, the crumbling finances of the orphanage becomes apparent when the bank gave a final warning before foreclosing on the orphanage.
And so our orphan took on the debt and now must grow and develop to pay off the debt.

70 collectable cards

Grow the power of your cards.
- Cards scale with Strength, Agility, Constitution, Intelligence and Wisdom.
- Craft powerful items.

Take quests and hunt powerful creatures.
Travel to many varied places in search of prey, wealth and glory.
